name: Up and Down the Word Ladder: Part 3 Online Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's a playing tip - If you can't solve the first clue go to one of the others that you can solve, and then work up and down from there.
The first word has three letters -

Moved swiftly on foot.

Now rearrange the letters of the previous word plus one new letter to create a word of four letters -

Mend hole in garment with thread.

This word has five letters -

Magnificent concert piano.

A word of six letters -

A risk of harm or vulnerability.

This word has seven letters -

Male geese.

Now remove one letter from the previous answer and rearrange the remaining letters to make a six letter word -

Land cultivated with flowers or vegetables.

Drop another letter to create a word of five letters -

Strong feeling of hostility or displeasure.

This word has four letters - 

Furious hostility or displeasure.

A word of three letters -

Unit of work energy.

The final word has two letters -

A small example.
